alert.note: Alert for Monterey; San Benito; Santa Clara; Santa Cruz (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 15 at 11:08AM PDT until further notice by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in California... Pajaro River At Chittenden affecting Santa Cruz, Santa Clara, Monterey and San Benito Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...In coordination with the Pajaro Regional Flood Management Agency as well as Monterey and Santa Cruz Counties flooding is expected below the official flood stage along the Monterey County portion of the Pajaro River due to observed impacts from the recent levee failures. * WHERE...Pajaro River At Chittenden. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM PDT Wednesday the stage was 19.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.0 feet this morning. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 1700 PM PDT.

area.areaDesc: Monterey; San Benito; Santa Clara; Santa Cruz
